name: Shooter 360 for Oculus Quest
description:
Hello! I'm indie game developer. I made my second game Shooter 360 and it's wave shooter for Oculus Quest. 

There are no multiplayer or singleplayer missions,  

The game was created just to shoot and have fun.

Weapons: pistol and grenades

Enemies: soldiers, zombies and drones.

Don't forget to protect citizen from zombies , because she  searching crystalls for you.
